posts.post_title: WTT: T206 Zack Wheat Sovereign 460 SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade this Zack Wheat Sov460 for a comparably priced T206 Hindu back or American Beauty back.  The back is clean, but I will send a scan of the back before completing the deal.  Let me know, thanks.  Card is no longer available

Mark Foytack
